snippet: British authorities will not charge a computer hacker who waged a decade-long struggle to avoid a trial in the United States over accusations that he broke into military computers.
lead_paragraph: British authorities will not charge a computer hacker who waged a decade-long struggle to avoid a trial in the United States over accusations that he broke into military computers.

headline.main: Britain: Police Say They Won’t Charge Hacker
headline.print_headline: Britain: Police Say They Won’t Charge Hacker
